name: Sunset Berry Tea
desc: A fruity drink with a pleasantly sour taste. This scented tea gives off the pleasant aroma of fresh fruit. Its cold and refreshing taste is sure to dispel the stifling heat with each gulp.

customize.name: Recipe: Sunset Berry Tea
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipes for making Sunset Berry Tea.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Berry
customize.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Delicious Sunset Berry Tea
customize.desc: A fruity drink with a pleasantly sour taste. The redolence of tea carries your thoughts away. With one sip of this tea, you feel as if you are lazing in a flourishing orchard, tipsy in the gentle breeze that carries a fruity scent.

customize.name: Suspicious Sunset Berry Tea
customize.desc: A fruity drink with a pleasantly sour taste. You added sugar to temper the sourness of the tea but accidentally lost control of the added quantity. What should have been a thirst-quenching beverage has now become a throat-clenching liquid. Water, let's have some more water...

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
